summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from August 3, 2021, requesting a short summary paragraph about the Ghislaine Maxwell case for a briefing book being prepared for an Assistant Director in Charge (ADIC). The email includes an attached case summary document and asks for the write-up to include when the trial is slated to begin.

persons.name: Chloe
persons.context: Mentioned as the person preparing a briefing book for an Assistant Director in Charge (ADIC) regarding the Maxwell case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the case summary being requested; her trial date is to be included in the write-up.

events.title: FBI request for Maxwell case summary
events.description: Internal FBI email chain requesting a short summary paragraph on the Ghislaine Maxwell case for a briefing book being prepared for an ADIC.

keyFacts: The document is an internal FBI email chain dated August 3, 2021.
The FBI is preparing a briefing book for an Assistant Director in Charge (ADIC) regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
A short case summary paragraph is requested, specifically asking for inclusion of when Maxwell's trial is slated to begin.
An attachment named 'JEGM_Case_Summary.docx' is referenced, suggesting a pre-existing case summary document.
The email indicates routine internal communication and case preparation within the FBI regarding the ongoing Maxwell prosecution.
